name: dice-and-coin
title: Dice & Coin
description: Quickly and easily make random decisions or generate a random number
author: yonbergman

commands.name: toss-coin
commands.title: Toss Coin
commands.description: Toss a coin and get a random result

commands.name: throw-dice
commands.title: Throw Dice
commands.description: Throw a six sided die and get a random result

commands.name: throw-custom-dice
commands.title: Throw Custom Dice
commands.description: Throw an impossible custom sided die and get a random result

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
